name: The Creator's Blackboard
description:
Technical drawings with basic shapes.
There is a shape placed in every corner. Each of those shapes is a random configuration of 6 possible lines (from a square with 2 diagonals). For example: this can be 3 lines that form a triangle, or 2 lines that form a cross. It can also be a single point. 

All those shapes interact with each other and project smaller versions of themselves towards any of the other shapes.

A new variation will be generated when clicking on the canvas / resize screen / press 1
Key press 2 - 6 will show different random variations, using the same algorithm in a different way.
Press 7 to show the original variation that is used as the preview image.
